content: Once again, as an AI language model, I don't have knowledge of a specific location. However, many cities have parks and green spaces, sometimes even within walking distance of residential towers. Some of these parks may be pet-friendly and may have designated dog walking areas. It could be helpful to check with the building management or do online research to find out about the availability of green spaces near the residential tower. You can also use online mapping services or GPS applications to search for nearby parks, dog parks, or green spaces.
